pipeline.description: Manages the order history of a registered user.

text-node.description: Renders a page with the order history of the current logged in customer.

Renders a page with details of a single order. The pipeline is intended to render the order details by the UUID of the order, therefor can also be used for unregistered customers to track the status of their orders.

This pipeline is intended to find an order by its order number and the postal code of the billing address. The pipeline is used by the login page and end on a named end node "ok" if the order was found or ends with a named end node "error" to report back to the calling pipeline.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Determine single order by its UUID
Determine single order by its order number
